alert.note: Alert for Fresno; Kings (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 24 at 8:04AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: .High flows along the Kings River are expected into the foreseeable future due to releases from Pine Flat Dam. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release. * WHERE...A portion of central California, including the following counties, Fresno, Kings and Tulare. * WHEN...Until 100 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. River of stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 758 AM PDT, An upstream floodgate release is expected to cause minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sanger, Reedley, and the Kingsburg Golf Course. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
